explains: n. 一知半解；少数；略知
adj. 肤浅的；些许的；点滴的
v. 略知；肤浅地学习；粉碎（smatter 的 ing 形式）

sentences.en: He only has a smattering of French.
I had acquired a smattering of Greek.
sentences.cn: 我学会了一丁点儿希腊文。

sentences.en: On his wanderings he's picked up Spanish, Italian, French and a smattering of Russian.
sentences.cn: 在流浪途中，他学会了西班牙语、意大利语、法语和一点点俄语。
